Title: Derrière la façade
Writer: Yves Mirande (dialogue), Georges Lacombe (adaptation), Max Kolpé (adaptation), Yves Mirande (scenario)
Actors: Lucien Baroux, Jules Berry, André Lefaur, Gaby Morlay
Plot: The owner of an apartment building is found murdered. Two rival policemen, Boucheron and Lambert, investigate the matter and get into the private lives of the tenants: an unfaithful judge, a crippled blind man and his daughter, an eccentric knife thrower, a shoplifter (and proud of it!), a bourgeois lady who has a bone to pick with a gigolo, a mistress who cheats on her lover, not forgetting the caretaker and a soldier in love...
